attributes.action: not increase taxes until decisive action has been taken to put an end to all British-linked tax havens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enormous bail-outs for the banks are essential to prevent economic collapse but will necessitate tax increases in the future. This and all future governments can only claim legitimacy if they ensure that the burden is fairly shared and that the richest Britons pay proportionately.
